gen:link.msg:message: `BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesPublicOfferingBreakdownBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
